actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of yesterday, the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of yesterday, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today.

H.R. 1316 (Rep. Jackson):
        A bill to amend the Export Control Reform Act of 2018 relating to licensing transparency.

        -- Senate Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.

        -- Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.


 H.R. 3944 (Rep. Carter):
        A bill making appropriations for military construction, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes.

        -- Motion to proceed to measure considered in Senate.

        -- Cloture on the motion to proceed to the measure invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 7. Record Vote Number: 423 



 S.Res. 332 (Sen. Barrasso):
        A resolution designating July 26, 2025, as "National Day of the American Cowboy".

        -- Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

PN22-7:
        Bradley Hansell, of Virginia, to be Under Secretary of Defense for Intelligence and Security

        -- By unanimous consent agreement, vote 7/22/2025.

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 35. Record Vote Number: 425 



 PN26-11:
        Terrance Cole, of Virginia, to be Administrator of Drug Enforcement

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 419 



 PN26-27:
        Aaron Lukas, of Arkansas, to be Principal Deputy Director of National Intelligence

        -- By unanimous consent agreement, vote 7/22/2025.

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 46. Record Vote Number: 424 



 PN150-2:
        Joshua M. Divine, of Missouri, to be United States District Judge for the Eastern and Western Districts of Missouri

        -- By unanimous consent agreement, vote 7/22/2025.

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 46. Record Vote Number: 420 



 PN150-6:
        Cristian M. Stevens, of Missouri, to be United States District Judge for the Eastern District of Missouri

        -- By unanimous consent agreement, vote 7/22/2025.

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 421 



 PN346-2:
        Emil J. Bove III, of Pennsylvania, to be United States Circuit Judge for the Third Circuit

        -- Motion to proceed to executive session to consideration of nomination agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 422 


        -- Cloture motion presented in Senate.
Under the authority of the order of today, at  8:00 p.m, the Presiding Officer (Mr. Curtis in the chair) declared the Senate adjourned, under its order of today, until 10 a.m. tomorrow.
